statements: UPSERT INTO research_projects (id, project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date) VALUES (1, 'Project 1', 'Description 1', '2022-01-01', '2022-12-31')
UPSERT INTO research_projects (id, project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date) VALUES (2, 'Project 2', 'Description 2', '2022-02-01', '2022-11-30')
UPSERT INTO research_projects (id, project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date) VALUES (3, 'Project 3', 'Description 3', '2022-03-01', '2022-10-31')

UPSERT INTO research_projects (project_id, project_name, start_date, lead_researcher) VALUES (1, 'Project A', '2022-01-01', 'John Doe') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE project_name = VALUES(project_name), start_date = VALUES(start_date), lead_researcher = VALUES(lead_researcher);

UPSERT INTO research_papers (paper_id, paper_title, publication_date, author_name, project_id) VALUES (1, 'Paper 1', '2022-02-01', 'Jane Smith', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE paper_title = VALUES(paper_title), publication_date = VALUES(publication_date), author_name = VALUES(author_name);

UPSERT INTO research_projects (project_id, project_name, start_date, lead_researcher) VALUES (2, 'Project B', '2022-03-01', 'Alice Johnson') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE project_name = VALUES(project_name), start_date = VALUES(start_date), lead_researcher = VALUES(lead_researcher);
